title: banned
body: I have been banned or permanentaly suspended and i would like to be unsuspended please and thank you

replies.body: I submit ticket but no answer yet

Your best bet for anything involving suspensions or bans is to hit us up through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where we'll be able to go over all of that info privately!
